VII.i.4.A.1.f
.
Propriety of Telephone Contact With a Claimant
Regional office employees may contact a claimant by telephone to obtain
clarification
of information the claimant provided on a form.  They may
not
, however, utilize telephone contact to complete a form on a claimant’s behalf.
Exception
:  See
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.4.f
, for an exception to the policy expressed in this block.
